project.description: This job is used to upload an updated pic-sure-auth-micro-app (psama) configuration file. If you would like to download the current configuration file you can use the "Download PSAMA Configuration" Jenkins Job.

hudson.model.FileParameterDefinition.name: psama.env
hudson.model.FileParameterDefinition.description: The updated pic-sure-auth-micro-app configuration file. You can download the current configuration file using the "Download PSAMA Configuration".

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: # Replace psama's configuration file with the provided one. cp psama.env /usr/local/docker-config/psama/psama.env
